description: A project is the overall structure that can contain multiple activity phases (a project name is required).

project_name.description: The name of the overall project.

phases.description: Phases are the stages of an activity that determines the assignment of different resources to different students and devices according to groups (at least one phase is required). Each phase must be associated with exactly one board.

items.description: Boards are contexts that contain many resources such a canvas, buckets, bucket view, workspace, monitor, and TODOs (at least one board is required).

canvas.description: The canvas is a 2D organizational structure that can store, organize, or be used to create student-generated posts (a canvas exists by default; only one canvas exists per board).

additionalProperties.description: An array of group names that can view the canvas during the phase specified by the key (which should be one of the phases defined in the 'phases' array).

bucket_view.description: The bucket view can display 0-4 buckets, showing all the student-generated posts within each bucket.

additionalProperties.description: An array of group names that can view the bucket view during the phase specified by the key (which should be one of the phases defined in the 'phases' array).

buckets.description: Buckets are organizational structures that can store and organize student posts (buckets are optional).

monitor_view.description: The monitor view allows students to see their personal analytics and the teacher to see all students' analytics.

additionalProperties.description: An array of group names that can view the monitor view during the phase specified by the key (which should be one of the phases defined in the 'phases' array).

todo.description: The TODO view allows students to define personal or group tasks to be completed; the teacher may also assign tasks for them.

additionalProperties.description: An array of group names that can view the TODO view during the phase specified by the key (which should be one of the phases defined in the 'phases' array).

workspace.description: The workspace view displays student-assigned activities that involve the generation or peer review of student-generated posts.

additionalProperties.description: An array of group names that can view the workspace during the phase specified by the key (which should be one of the phases defined in the 'phases' array).

groups.description: Groups are used to cluster students or devices that both enable resources to be assigned by group and workspace and TODO tasks to be assigned by group.

accounts.description: Defines the various accounts (students, teachers, devices), their group assignments, and their classroom (x, y coordinates, where y=0 is the front).

students.description: A mapping of student names to their groups and classroom location.

teachers.description: A mapping of teacher names to their groups and classroom location.

devices.description: A mapping of device identifiers to their groups and classroom location.
